text: Quantitative analysis may refer to: * Quantitative research, application of mathematics and statistics in economics and marketing * Quantitative analysis (chemistry), the determination of the absolute or relative abundance of one or more substances present in a sample * Quantitative analysis of behavior, quantitative models in the experimental analysis of behavior * Mathematical psychology, an approach to psychological research using mathematical modeling of perceptual, cognitive and motor processes * Statistics, the collection, organization, analysis, interpretation and presentation of data, in social science ==See also== * QA (disambiguation)
title: Quantitative analysis
